thread.title: Serena Williams Just Gave Big Sister Venus Williams the Sweetest Instagram Shoutout
thread.title_full: Serena Williams Just Gave Big Sister Venus Williams the Sweetest Instagram Shoutout

author: Kelsey Glein
title: Serena Williams Just Gave Big Sister Venus Williams the Sweetest Instagram Shoutout
text:
â€º Serena Williams Just Gave Big Sister Venus Williams the Sweetest Instagram Shoutout Serena Williams Just Gave Big Sister Venus Williams the Sweetest Instagram Shoutout Nicholas Hunt/Getty Images by: Kelsey Glein 
They may fiercely compete against each other on the court, but that doesn't mean there's any love lost between Venus and Serena Williams . 
And the younger of the two tennis stars took to Instagram today to drive that point home, sharing a beautiful photo of her big sister with an even more touching caption in which she referred to Venus, 36, as "her everything." " My #wcw my #bestfriend my #sister my #heart #myeverything #mybigsister," Serena, 35, wrote alongside the happy image of her older sibling. A photo posted by Serena Williams (@serenawilliams) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:58am PST 
The post comes just a few days after Serena defeated Venus in the Australian Open final on Saturday, where the champ won her record-breaking 23rd Grand Slam. The family members shared an ecstatic hug post match that demonstrated their unwavering support of one another in front of the cheering crowds. 
VIDEO: Serena Williams's Best Instagram Selfies 

This is also far from the first time that Serena has shown Venus love on social media. Following her big victory over the weekend, she 'grammed an image of the duo and wrote: " The top is never lonely when your best friend @venuswilliams is there. Here's to #23. What a night for our family. " A photo posted by Serena Williams (@serenawilliams) on Jan 28, 2017 at 8:35am PST
